casebody.data:
SIMPLE TECHNOLOGY, INC. (now known as SimpleTech, Inc.), Plaintiff-Appellant, v. DENSE-PAC MICROSYSTEMS, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 01-1310. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: March 7, 2002.

Before LOURIE, Circuit Judge, FRIEDMAN, Senior Circuit Judge, CLEVENGER, Circuit Judge.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
